content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at position(-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

###Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at position(1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5) containing iron ore

###Smelting Area at position(1, 1)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (1, 1) and (3, 1) with coal fuel
- Two burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Three wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), and (5.5, 3.5)
- Additional burner inserter at (5.5, 2.5)

###Production Complex at position(14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5) for copper cable production
- Multiple burner inserters at (14.5, 12.5), (12.5, 14.5), (16.5, 14.5)
- Multiple wooden chests at (14.5, 11.5), (11.5, 14.5), (17.5, 14.5)

###Electronic Circuit Production at position(21.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Multiple burner inserters at (19.5, 15.5), (23.5, 15.5)
- Wooden chest at (24.5, 15.5) containing electronic circuits

###Water System
Consists of:
- Offshore pumps at (-7.5, 25.5), (2.5, 34.5), and (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at (37.5, 19.0)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)
- Multiple pipe networks connecting these components

###Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production facilities, including:
- Belt networks at positions (5.5, 8.5), (2.5, 8.5), (4.5, 8.5)
- Various interconnected belt groups for material transport

ERROR TIPS

###Errors when connecting fluid entities
- Ensure connection points between fluid entities (pumps, boilers, etc.) are not blocked
- Verify proper alignment and spacing between fluid entities before attempting connections

###Errors when handling pipe entities
- Cannot access pipe coordinates using array indexing
- Use proper pipe entity properties and methods to access position information

###Entity placement errors
- Check if target location is clear before placing entities
- Ensure proper spacing between entities that need to connect

###Connection errors
- Verify that entities are properly aligned before attempting connections
- Ensure all required connection points are accessible and unblocked
